parameters.value:
#MESH PARAMETERS #--------------- INITIAL_POLL_SIZE 1 MAX_POLL_SIZE 100000
POLL_BASIS 4 COARSENING_EXPONENT 1 REFINING_EXPONENT -1 # #POLL PARAMETERS #--------------- POLL_ORDER 0 POLL_COMPLETE 0 POLL_DIRECTIONS 4 # #SEARCH PARAMETERS #----------------- INITIAL_SEARCH 0 INITIAL_COMPLETE 0 INITIAL_POINTS 4 ITERATIVE_SEARCH 0 ITERATIVE_COMPLETE 0 ITERATIVE_POINTS 0 SPECULATIVE_SEARCH 1 # #TERMINATION PARAMETERS #---------------------- POLL_SIZE_TERM -1 CONSECUTIVE_FAILS -1 TRUTH_EVALS 500 ITERATIONS -1 NEW_TRUTH_EVALS -1 # #FILTER PARAMETERS #----------------- FILTER_RELATIVE 1 HMAX 50000 HMIN 0.0001 FILTER_NORM 2 # #SURROGATE PARAMETERS #-------------------- SURROGATE_TOLERANCE 0

PROBLEM_NAME PC SCALING_CHOICE 0 GEN_CONS_NB 0 USE_SURROGATE 0 USE_BLACK_BOXES 0 USE_BOUNDS 1 USE_CACHES 1 CACHE_FILE cache DIRECTORY . START_PT_FILE start_pt.txt RESULTS_FILE results.txt BOUNDS_FILE bounds.txt
